app_name: Pixl - Face Tune Selfie Editor & Blemish Remover
app_detail:
â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸ Get your best look with our new beauty photo editing app "Pixl - Face Tune Selfie Editor & Blemish Remover"
â™¥ï¸ Want to look sweet and perfect like a model from the cover of a beauty magazine on your profile pictures but a pimply complexion, dry skin, a hair out of placeâ€, red eyes, or just bad lighting really messing up an otherwise perfect-for-sharing picture? We have the perfect solution for you.

â™¥ï¸ Now you can retouch and tune your face photos using our selfie beauty photo editor. Nice & easy to use and it only takes a few minutes to get rid of visible facial flaws for a stunning picture. "Pixl - Face Tune Selfie Editor & Blemish Remover" app is a professional beauty laboratory for your facial photos. Remove pimples and wrinkles, outline the eyes, whiten the teeth in seconds and add artistic flair to selfies and portraits with ease, from the convenience of your phone and more than that with all operations made automatically!

â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸â™¥ï¸ BENEFITS of "Pixl - Face Tune Selfie Editor & Blemish Remover":

â­ Face Retouch / Face Tune / Sweet Selfie
â™¥ï¸ Get a beautiful selfie photo, retouch and tune your face portrait in a click and apply impressive filters and photo effects in a way which other viewer will not understood that photo was retouched.
â™¥ï¸ Face Retouch and Face Tune tool provides you with all the trendy beauty makeup kit. 
â™¥ï¸ Take a photo and retouch it with various beauty makeup options like face foundation or applying lipstick and blushes, removing pimples, pigmentation or more face tune.
â™¥ï¸ Also the Face Retouch and Face Tune tool provides more then 50+ beauty makeup style and filter. Beauty camera filters professionally designed to enhance even the best pictures and sweet selfie photos for a perfect, beautiful finishing touch. Some filters can add natural-looking makeup to your pics
â™¥ï¸ And finnaly, in the Face Retouch and Face Tune section you'll find sweet selfie makeover effects - from lipstick, contour and eyelashes, to brows and hair color, faux freckles and glitter in order to help you to find a look you love

â­ Pimple and Blemish Remover
Say goodbye to pimples and blemishes! We provide you with an advanced and magically blemishe remover photo editing tool that works on all skin tones and complexions. With our blemish remover, you can eliminate pimples and unwanted spots with the tap of a finger. Add a swipe of blush to add radiance and charm. Unlike other apps, our Blemish Remover tool does not simply 'blur' the target area. Instead, it uses advanced imaging algorithms to blend the source data into the healed area providing seamless, realistic image repairs.

â­ Get a Clear and Perfect Smooth Skin
â™¥ï¸ Improve your skin's appearance with our Face Retouch and Face Tune tool, make it smooth and clear without any scars or unwanted marks. Retouch, Tune, edit and even tan your skin to achieve perfect, glowing perfection in just a few swipes! Your skin will look naturally radiant in all of your selfies and photos!

â­ Acne Remover 
â™¥ï¸ So having a very bad acne days? Acne removal photo editing process has never been easier. With Acne Remover tool give yourself acne and wrinkle-free skin. Blemishes Acne, pimples, wrinkles, dark circles, dark spots are very easy to remove, just tap on and see the magic with the Face Retouch and Face Tune tool.

â­ Share your sweet selfie on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter from right within the app

â¤ï¸ğŸ’›ğŸ’šğŸ’™ğŸ’œ SAY HELLO ğŸ™‹â€ We're anxious to hear from you! â¤ï¸ğŸ’›ğŸ’šğŸ’™ğŸ’œ

We are constantly working hard on making "Pixl - Face Tune Selfie Editor & Blemish Remover" app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of "Pixl - Face Tune Selfie Editor & Blemish Remover" app, do not forget to rate us on play store.
